Soft and Sour? Sign Me Up!

     Waterbridge has come with a new kind of treat to satisfy our tastebuds. The sweet flavour of a foamy strawberry-vanilla milkshake mixed with a lip-puckering sour taste will have you reaching in for more. Luckily, this bag is resealable to ensure fresh marshmallows any time you want! Make sure to share, they might be gone sooner than you think.

Deliciously sweet and chewy taffy, now sour! Waterbridge has taken their classic salt water taffy recipe and added a whole bunch of sour flavours. Grab a bag and see which flavour is your favourite. entry.title: Waterbridge Allsorts Large Pouch - 400g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 8.99

Waterbridge Allsorts Large Pouch

British Liquorice Candy 

Fun Shaped and All-natural 

Have a taste of England as you indulge in this bag of fun, colourful, all-natural candies! You will surely enjoy the quality of these sweet, chewy assortment of licorice, gummies, and treats. Each piece of candy has its own unique texture and taste. Which one will be your favourite? Discover what fulfils your tastebuds today!

Since 1993, Waterbridge has been seeking out fresh, new treats from the best manufacturers around the world so that Canadians can have a taste of these delightful English delicacies. 

This large pouch features 5 delicious varieties to enjoy:
Lemon | Raspberry and chocolate sandwiches |
Pink & yellow coconut rolls | Candy-coated jelly buttons | Liquorice bites

400g

Fresh Candy Shipped Fast!

Ingredients

Sugar, Molasses, Enriched Wheat Flour, Glucose Syrup (Wheat). Desiccated Coconut (Contains Sulphites), Palm Oil, Gelatine, Cornflour, Glycerol, Natural Colours, Cocoa Powder, Liquorice Extract, Beeswax, Flavours, Fruit & Vegetable Juices for Colour. Contains Gluten.

entry.title: Waterbridge Wine Gums Canadian Mix - 200 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Waterbridge
Type: Candy
Price: 4.39

Waterbridge | Canada's 150 Anniversary

Classic British Candy with a Canadian Twist

All-Natural Wine Gums

In honour of celebrating Canada’s 150th anniversary in 2017, Waterbridge created 8 fun shapes that reflect some of the most iconic items of Canada. Brian Hicks, Waterbridge founder, chose these shapes while reminiscing on Canadian memories he’s made since living here. 

Did you know?... In the late 1800s, English candy artisans discovered that mixing fermented wine with a gelling agent produces an irresistibly delicious confection - Wine Gums! Today, Wine Gums made by Waterbridge have perfected their recipes with all-natural colours and flavours! These special Wine Gums are made without gelatin, allowing vegetarians and vegans to enjoy this sweet treat. This chewy and uniquely delicious candy does not contain wine, making it the perfect treat for both kids and adults. 

In this 200g pouch you will find 8 candy shapes:

Beaver | Ice Skates | Canoe | Loonie Coin | 
Maple Leaf | Canadian Flag | Moose Head | Waterbridge Bar

 

What iconic Canadian memories have you created with loved ones? Share your story with a bag of Waterbridge’s Special Edition Canadian Mix and use #WaterbridgeJoy and #Canada150 on social media! Don’t forget to tag @candyfunhouse #candyfunhouse to share where you got this delicious bag of wine gums so others can enjoy too.

  • Gelatin-Free
  • Zero Artificial Colours
  • Zero Artificial Flavours
  • Vegan
  • Vegetarian

200 g

If you love Waterbridge Wine Gums, you'd love these varieties too!

Waterbridge Wine Gums Jumbo Bag - 1kg

Waterbridge Wine Gums Red and Black Berries - 200 g

Waterbridge Jelly Babies - 200g

Fresh British Candy Shipped Fast!

In the late 1800s, English candy artisans discovered that mixing fermented wine with a gelling agent produces an irresistibly delicious confection - Wine Gums! Today, Wine Gums made by Waterbridge have perfected their recipes with all natural colours and flavours! Be delighted by wine gums made with real fruit juices: orange, pear, lemon, lime, raspberry, & blackcurrant. This chewy and uniquely delicious candy does not contain wine, making it the perfect treat for both kids and adults.

Waterbridge Just Fudge Butter Fudge is supremely creamy and sweet, and it’s just the thing for a cold winter afternoon or evening. Enjoy with some hot chocolate or just some coffee. 

Waterbridge Just Fudge Butter Fudge is a gift that’s always certain to please. Get this fool-proof present for all the people in your life. If you haven’t tried traditional fudge, you don’t know what you’re missing. Place your order now and finally find out. This fudge is calling your name!

Waterbridge Sesame

The English love their toffee… and we know you will too! Warning: you will definitely eat the whole bag! The word “Toffee” first appeared in the Oxford English Dictionary in 1825 though it is believed that toffee was invented before its official induction. We at Waterbridge are bringing these exquisite centuries-old traditional sweets to all Canadians!
